newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia to auction 12.00 trln rls of T-bills Oct 30.
newsitem.headline: Russia to auction 12.00 trln rls of T-bills Oct 30.

text.p: The Russian finance ministry will offer nine trillion roubles in an issue of six-month GKO discount Treasury bills and three trillion roubles in a new tranche of six-month T-bills on October 30, the central bank said on Wednesday.
Full details of the six-month T-bills auction:
NOTE - Although the issue runs for a little over than four months, it is officially classified as a six-month paper.
Full details of the new tranche of six-month T-bills:
On Tuesday the issue closed at 50.00 percent and yielded 93.99 percent when it was first auctioned.
On October 30 the finance ministry will repay about 7.79 trillion roubles in maturing issue of six-month T-bills (series 22031).
